roleset.name: not smart or wise
roleset.note: DUMB-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, stupid-j.01. (from dumb.01-j)

role.descr: thing described as dumb (may require concatenation- see exs)

example.name: mental property
example.text: They always seem to focus on how " dumb " she is .

example.name: empty it, concatenation
example.text: It was dumb of her to slap an officer on the butt.
example.arg: [to slap an officer on the butt],[of her]

example.name: concatenation
example.text: Man admits he was 'dumb' to point laser at airplane.

roleset.name: unable to speak
roleset.note: DUMB-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WN. (from dumb.02-j)

example.name: the arg
example.text: Til he was seven years old he was completely dumb, and even then the organs of speech were not so effectually developed, but that he was ever afterwards obliged to speak very slowly, in order to be intelligible.
example.arg: Til he was seven years old
